titleStmt.title: SII 4.860: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 860. (A.R. No. 47 of 1893). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvijayakaṇṭakopāladevaṟkku yāṇṭu 7vatu tulāṉāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu dvādaśiyum tiṅkaḷkkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa cataiyattu nāḷ gaṇapatidevamahārājāviṉ pratāṉikaḷil
Aḷappūril tevaceṭṭi makan piramaceṭṭiyeṉ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Eyiṟkkoṭṭattu ṉakaram kāñcipurattut tiruvattiyūr niṉṟaruḷiya Aruḷāḷap perumāḷukku nāṉ vaitta tirunaṉtāviḷakkukku viṭṭa
pālppacu pattum ciṉaippacu pattum polimaṟaināku paṉiraṇṭum Iṣapam Oṉṟum Āka 2 10 5 muppattumūṉṟukkum niccaiyitta tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟu Itil cittirameḻikkoṉ Āṭcivacam viṭṭa tirunantāviḷakku mukkāle
mākāṇiyum piḷḷāṉkoṉ peṟṟāṉvacam viṭṭa tirunantāviḷakku Orumāmukkāṇi Araikkāṇiyum comakkoṉ cantivacam viṭṭa tirunantāviḷakku Orumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇiyum Ākat tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟum kai
kkoṇṭu nāḷ Oṉṟukku Arienṉavallāṉ nāḻiyāle Uḻakku neyyum nāḻit tayir Amutum Ittirunantāviḷakku Eriya nāṉ Iṭṭa Eṟumpukāṇit tirukkuttuviḷakku Oṉṟum kaikkoṇṭu cantirātittavarai Inta tirunantāviḷa
kku celuttakkaṭavomākak kalluveṭṭikkuṭuttom perumāḷ koyilttāṉattom Ippaṭikku Ivai koyiṟkaṇakkuc ciyapuramuṭaiyān vaḷaiyamaḻakiyā Aruḷāḷappiriyaṉ Eḻuttuḥu
Digital edition of SII 4.860 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
